about_the_game:
In "Oops! Zombie Swarm," an FPS survival game, an outbreak of an unknown virus has turned most people into zombies. But you have survived, thanks to a mysterious dragon egg nearby, whose magic can shield against the virus. Now, you must use every means to protect this sole beacon of hope.

Game Features

Diverse Arsenal: The game offers a rich selection of weapons, from ancient bows and spears to modern rifles and shotguns, to the primitive yet powerful axe. Each weapon provides a unique combat experience. Choose the one that best suits your fighting style and bravely face the zombie hordes.

Thrilling Headshots

The game's shooting mechanics make each precise headshot extremely satisfying. Feel the rush of lethal precision with each shot, finding joy in battle amidst the apocalypse.

Weapon Upgrades

Coins earned in battle can be used to upgrade your weapons, increasing their rate of fire, damage, and accuracy. Each upgrade makes you more adept at navigating through the zombie masses.

Treasure Chest Rewards

Treasure chests hidden in various corners of the game contain rewards ranging from coins to weapons. These random prizes will help you survive better in the game.


In this new world of despair and chaos, protecting the magic-filled dragon egg is your ultimate mission. Every battle is a test of your survival skills, and every choice could determine your fate.

Join "Oops! Zombie Swarm," find your footing in this challenging survival fight, protect the last hope, and let the light of hope illuminate this dark world.

content_descriptors.notes: When attacking zombies, there will be realistic blood effects.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: MacOS 10.15
  • Processor: 苹果 M1 或英特尔酷睿 M
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 960 or equivalent performance graphics card
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: MacOS 14.1.2
  • Processor: 苹果 M1 或英特尔酷睿 M
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 2060 or equivalent performance graphics card

short_description: An unknown virus has turned most people into zombies. In this disaster, you unexpectedly discover a mysterious dragon egg, which seems to grant you immunity to the virus. Now, your mission is to protect this precious dragon egg and ensure it is not destroyed by hordes of zombies.
